name: LudoNarraCon Supporter Pack featuring Cyrano
summary:
A promotional pack for LudoNarraCon 2021, featuring the exclusive game Cyrano, along with a selection of wallpapers and a compilation album of music from the convention's exhibitors.

This one hour adaptation of the classic stage play, Cyrano de Bergerac, invites you to fight with blades and wits. Cyrano is the greatest swordsman and wordsmith in all of France. He also has the largest nose and the fiercest temper. He has stood alone against a hundred soldiers and can best the wits of any poet alive, but when he falls in love with Roxane, he is hopeless. How could she ever love such a ridiculous nose? When Roxane falls for a beautiful young soldier, Cyrano sees an opportunity to share his heart but hide his face.
